Emergency authorisation has been sought for the use of Pfizer and Oxford-AstraZeneca's coronavirus vaccines in India, following the lead of the UK and Russia.

articles.title: ASIC takes tech group iSignthis to court - Sydney Morning Herald

articles.description: Ivan Glasenberg has long made it clear that the only real business of Glencore is to make money for shareholders. He has just created an awkward conundrum for his successor.
